name: Fight For Death
description:
Fight For Death is a third person shooter game with reincarnation mechanics made for JTA GameJam #2
If you die by the hands of an enemy, You reincarnate in that enemy, but only as long as you have "life" points , You can gather life points by killing other enemies, everytime you die, you get one of your life points subtracted and you reincarnate as your killer, If you die with no "life" points,  the game ends.

There is another reference to the theme in the game, for the players to find out on their own.
Controls : 
WASD - Movement
Mouse - Aim
Lmb - Shoot
Rmb - Target
